name: Beware the Businessman's Grip
description:
Created for the RevJame 2: The Revening
You are an average nameless corporate worker and you're stuck on your annual unpaid forced golf retreat. You must do everything you can to sneak away from your game of golf to stop an evil capitalist scheme.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

R - Enter alt camera mode (in golf state)

L Mouse - Enter golf state (hold)

R Mouse - Hit ball (in golf state)

AD - Aim left and right (in golf state)

WS - Adjust power (in golf state)

Q - Show ball's location

= - Advance to next objective
